doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) National Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) National Office Records
Series I: Constitutions, By-Laws, Agreements, Codes and Contracts
Series I: Constitutions, By-Laws, Agreements, Codes and Contracts

This series is comprised of constitutions and by-laws for both AFRA and AFTRA, as well as national agreements, codes and contracts. These files document the fundamental principles of the organization and the internal rules for how to conduct activities.
